name: Thomas P. RICHARD, Sr., petitioner, v. DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF WESTMORELAND COUNTY, PENNSYLVANIA, et al.
name_abbreviation: Richard v. Dist. Attorney of Westmoreland Cnty.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Thomas P. RICHARD, Sr., petitioner,
v.
DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF WESTMORELAND COUNTY, PENNSYLVANIA, et al.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
casebody.head_matter:
Thomas P. RICHARD, Sr., petitioner,
v.
DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF WESTMORELAND COUNTY, PENNSYLVANIA, et al.
No. 18-6503.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 7, 2019.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
